definitions.definition: The action of erasing ; deletion ; obliteration .
The state of having been erased; total blankness .
The place where something has been erased.
examples: There were several erasures on the paper.

definitions.definition: A tendency to ignore or conceal an element of society.

main_definition: The action of erasing ; deletion ; obliteration .
secondary_definitions: The state of having been erased; total blankness .
The place where something has been erased.
( sociology ) A tendency to ignore or conceal an element of society.
